snippet: KOHNOP--Pearl, 97, on January 30, 2016. Devoted wife of the late Dr. Benjamin Kohnop. An avid reader and bridge player, she is survived by three generations of loving nieces and nephews. Services private. Donations in her memory to Dysautonomia Foundation, 315 West 39th St., #
lead_paragraph: KOHNOP--Pearl, 97, on January 30, 2016. Devoted wife of the late Dr. Benjamin Kohnop. An avid reader and bridge player, she is survived by three generations of loving nieces and nephews. Services private. Donations in her memory to Dysautonomia Foundation, 315 West 39th St., #
